game.name: Netherwyn
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Netherwyn is a challenging co-op roguelite action RPG where each run sends you and your allies into plague-stricken lands filled with relentless hordes and deadly boss encounters. This first release centers on The Pestilence, the first of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Netherwyn is a challenging co-op roguelite action RPG where each run sends you and your allies into plague-stricken lands filled with relentless hordes and deadly boss encounters. This first release centers on The Pestilence, the first of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.
